column4: USen
What is this place?
Who are you?
Good-bye.
What?
Yes.
It's not much.

column3:
おお！お主はゾーラ川で会ったハイリア人！

シド王子に従い来てくれたのですね？

さぁ ドレファン王とシド王子が お待ちです
是非彼らと お会いください
column4:
Oh! You're that Hylian I met at
Zora River!

Are you here at Prince Sidon's request?


Well, King Dorephan and Prince Sidon
are waiting for you. Please help them!

column3:
ほほう…お主が
シド王子が連れてきたと言う ハイリア人ですね
是非 シド王子にお会いください
column4:
Ohoho... So you're back.
You're that Hylian our Prince Sidon
brought here, aren't you?
Please go and meet with him right away.
Good morning.
Good day.
Good evening.
Yes, sir! Nothing to report, sir!
...Yes? Did you need something?

column3:
ほほう ハイリア人か…
ゾーラの里までは魔物だらけだったでしょう？
今ゾーラの里では シド王子と共闘してくれる
戦士を募集しています
すぐにでも シド王子にお会いください
column4:
Ohoho, a Hylian, eh? The path
to Zora's Domain is paved with
monsters, is it not?
Here in the domain, we are currently
recruiting warriors to join Prince Sidon
in his fight.
Please hurry up and meet with him.
Farewell!

column3:
ここは ドレファン王と そのご子息
シド王子のおられる王の間でございます
column4:
At the top of these stairs is the throne
room of King Dorephan and his son,
Prince Sidon.
Me?

column3:
私の名はタッカ
新米の兵士です
column4: My name is Tottika. I'm a novice soldier.
By the way...HYLIAN...

column3:
このゾーラの里まで単身来られた
お主の事だから
よほどよい業物を持っているのでしょうね？
column4:
You managed to make it to Zora's Domain
all by yourself, eh?

That would mean you've got a pretty
reliable weapon on you, yes?

column3:
そうか

私も支給されたこの銀鱗の槍に
不満は無いのですが
世の中には使用者を選ぶと言われる
伝説の剣が あるらしいですね
column4:
I see.


I've been supplied a silverscale spear.
I have no complaints about it, but...

There are rumors of a legendary blade...
one that chooses its wielder.

column3:
私も武器に選ばれるような
立派な兵士に なりたいものです
column4:
I want to become an important soldier...
one who's worthy of being chosen by
a legendary weapon!

column3:
見ましたか？ ハイリアの人！

神獣 ヴァ・ルッタが現れてから
ずっと降っていた雨が止んだ
もしかして お主とシド王子が…？
column4:
Hylian! Have you seen?!


The rain that has been falling ever since
Divine Beast Vah Ruta was angered...
has finally stopped!
Was that you and Prince Sidon?

column3:
おお！ハイリアの人！
見事な活躍でした！
スババ兵隊長に聞いたのだが お主は
100年前にもこの里を訪れた英傑だとか…
column4:
Oh! Hylian! You have done us a
great service!

Captain Bazz filled me in. He told me you
are the Champion who visited Zora's
Domain 100 years ago. Or...something.

column3:
英傑様…
この度は ありがとうございました
column4:
Great Hylian Champion... Thank you so
much for all you have done for us.

column3:
これで お主の事を悪く言ってた年寄も
今回の活躍で お主を見直したかも知れませんね
column4:
Now, even the elders who were so down
on you are likely looking upon you with
regard and triumph!

column3:
今回の活躍で里の年寄りたちは
ミファー様の件も水に流してくれるでしょう
column4:
Because of your glorious deeds, I'm sure
the elders will be content to let the
subject of Mipha finally wash away.

column3:
今ゾーラの里では シド王子と共闘してくれる
戦士を募集しています
年寄は頭が固く
他種族を巻き込むことに反対ですが
里の若者及び ドレファン王は
豪の者なら誰でも受け入れるつもりです
詳細は この上におられる
ドレファン王から直々に聞いてください
column4:
Here in Zora's Domain, we're currently
recruiting warriors to join Prince Sidon
in his noble struggle.
However, the elders are...stubborn.
They are wholly against outsiders
getting involved in Zora affairs.
But King Dorephan, as well as the young
folk, are ready to accept anyone's help...
Well, so long as they are trustworthy.
If you wish to learn more, please go and
speak with King Dorephan directly.
